title: 'Electric hazard due to lack of 3 pin grounded power plug'
body: 'Bit of an electrical hazard
column5: power grid is not the best in India and lack of 3 pin grounded power connector means stray current can‚Äôt exit via ground. You can see tester light up on hdmi cable in my pic. Plugging this into a mbp results in an energized case that will shock you. If you have a 3 pin connector on the laptop it will be used as the grounding bus. Dunno how I feel about the much more expensive laptop being used as the grounding connection for my screens.'

title: 'Excellent Choice: MSI PRO MP241X 24-Inch Monitor'
body: The MSI PRO MP241X 24-Inch monitor has exceeded my expectations in every way. Its display quality is exceptional, offering vivid colors and sharp details that enhance my work and entertainment experiences. The 24-inch size strikes the perfect balance, fitting well on my desk without overwhelming it.  For its price point, the MSI PRO MP241X offers outstanding value. It's an excellent investment for anyone seeking a high-quality, versatile monitor. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It's an excellent addition to my setup, and I highly recommend it to others in search of a top-tier 24-inch monitor.

title: 'Critical Design Flaw: Lack of Grounding Pin in Adapter Causes Laptop Damage'
body: I purchased this monitor with high expectations, but I was deeply disappointed by the design of the included adapter. The absence of a grounding pin in the adapter led to a serious problem ‚Äì my laptop was receiving current from the monitor through the HDMI cable, causing damage to my laptop's internal components. I strongly urge the manufacturer to address this issue by providing an adapter with an inbuilt grounding pin to prevent potential damage.

title: 'MSI Modern 14 i7 Laptop and 24-Inch Business Monitor: Perfect for Productivity'
body: I recently had the pleasure of using the MSI Modern 14 laptop paired with a 24-inch business monitor, and I must say, it has been nothing short of perfect for my needs. This dynamic duo has significantly enhanced my overall user experience, both for work and leisure.  One of my favorite aspects of the MSI Modern 14 is its powerful performance. With the i7 processor, it effortlessly handles multitasking, making my work tasks smooth and efficient. Whether I'm working on demanding spreadsheets or editing graphics, this laptop delivers beyond my expectations, and I can complete tasks much faster.  The business monitor, at 24 inches, is just the right size for my workspace. The crisp display and vibrant colors make every document and image come to life. It's a game-changer for my productivity, allowing me to work with precision and clarity.  One of the main reasons I chose the MSI Modern 14 and this particular monitor was their reputation for reliability and performance. MSI has a track record of producing high-quality laptops, and this one is no exception. The monitor, too, has proven to be a reliable companion, with no issues whatsoever.  What sets this combo apart is its ability to fulfill my diverse needs. Whether it's for professional work, watching movies, or gaming during my downtime, it excels in every aspect. The laptop's portability allows me to take my work anywhere, while the monitor offers an immersive viewing experience at home.  In terms of strengths, the MSI Modern 14's lightweight design and long battery life are incredibly convenient for on-the-go professionals like me. It's also surprisingly quiet, which is a big plus during video conferences. As for the monitor, its sharp display and adjustable stand are definite strengths.  However, there are minimal weaknesses, such as the laptop's webcam quality, which could be improved. Nevertheless, this doesn't significantly impact my overall satisfaction with the product.  In conclusion, the MSI Modern 14 i7 laptop and the 24-inch business monitor have been a winning combination for me. They've elevated my user experience, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to anyone in need of a reliable, high-performance laptop and monitor setup.

title: 'A solid 4/5'
body: Monitor is above expectation when it's come to display, yeah there's some issue when it comes to reading small text but that can be tweeked with in built settings of the monitor.  The 2W speakers are clear and soothing when it comes to a monitor. However 4-5W speakers wouldn't hurt either. Thankfully there's an audio out port in the monitor with proper trick and expertise it can be connected to wireless speakers (Via. an appropriate external Bluetooth adapter)  4/5 is my overall experience after 1 day use.

title: 'Notes before buying'
body: 'This monitor is good for office use but not good for video playback.. there is too much ghosting .. took me few weeks to be determined to solve the ghosting issue.  Viewing angle is ok but not that great. Easy to install
column6: (Not so comfortable for eyes due to ghosting Never seen such delay in pixels response. In any of my previous monitors.. Not yet confirmed whether the all monitors in this model have the problem or only the one I recieved .)  Fix- Adaptive sync must be turned on to remove or reduce ghosting.  After the fix stated loving it. Now my eyes can relax.'
